职位信息
The MP&L Systems Integration department is the interface between the IT department and the MP&L users. It is responsible for developing and supporting systems and processes required to support all logistics functions. 物流系统集成部门是IT部门和物流用户之间的接口，它负责开发和支持系统和流程需求能够满足所有物流功能。
 
主要职责
1.Primary responsibilities are concerned with development and support for the systems and processes used by the Plant Operations department and MP&L plant staff and their interfaces to the Supply base. 主要职责涉及到用于车间操作部门、物流车间团队和他们接口的供应链基地的系统和流程的开发和支持
2.Assist the MP&L functions in developing strategies for common systems and business processes.在公共系统和业务流程方面促进物流功能开发策略的制定
3.Coordinate systems development between IT and MP&L.协调IT和物流之间的系统开发工作
4.Develop and document the business case to support system and process enhancements and establish quantified benefits to justify development effort. 开发和归档业务案例，以支持系统和流程改进，并建立可量化的效益来证明开发工作的作用
5.Write business specifications书写业务说明书
6.Coordinate and prioritise system development plans with user department and technical system support staff. 与用户部门、技术系统支持人员协调和优先考虑系统的开发计划。
7.Write test scripts and test system functionality书写测试文件和测试系统功能性
8.Prepare training materials, help information and user guides for new functionality and provides training, data conversion support and launch support / coordination to end user activities.针对新功能准备培训材料、帮助信息和用户引导，给终端用户提供培训、数据转换的支持和投入运行支持与协调
 
人才管理
0 direct reports
 
应聘条件
1.Degree qualified 拥有学位
2.Experience in Supply Chain 具备供应链工作经验
3.Experience of delivering SAP based MRP systems from a user perspective in business critical applications 具有从用户角度在业务上基于MRP系统的SAP应用的工作经验
4.Development of systems requirements to support new system introductions 具有制定系统需求以支持新系统开发的工作经验
5.Experience in Automotive or Manufacturing Industry 拥有汽车制造或制造业的工作经验 6.Experience of project management and process improvement 具备项目管理和过程改进的工作经验 7.Have strong analytical skills and statistical ability 具备较强的分析技能和统计技能
